channel.title: Organisation for Economic Co Operation and Development on Development Data Partnership
channel.description: Recent content in Organisation for Economic Co Operation and Development on Development Data Partnership

item.title: Facilitating Inter-Municipal Cooperation in Lithuania to Provide Better Access to Healthcare and Long-Term Care Services to Citizens
item.description: Lithuania is experiencing rapid demographic change, with the population both aging and significantly shrinking in recent decades. This trend has put pressure on the provision of public services such as health care, especially at the municipal level, and is expected to continue in the coming years.

item.title: Understanding Internet Connectivity to Tackle the Digital Divide
item.description: The Internet offers great potential for contributing to more prosperous societies. For instance, it enables small businesses to overcome the challenges of entering worldwide markets.

item.title: Studying Service Accessibility in Towns and Villages
item.description: Settlements – cities, towns and villages – provide jobs and access to services for their own residents and other people living nearby.

item.title: Reaching Digital Deserts – Extending Access to Broadband Has Never Been So Important
item.description: The internet is crucial for us to access information, services, job opportunities, education, and more. However, while urban communities flourish in the online world, many rural communities have been left behind when it comes to ensuring fast and reliable internet access.
